item.title: IC Devils Champion at Ice Varsity
item.author: Timothy Runcorn,
item.description: The Imperial Devils ice hockey team clinched the inaugural London Ice Varsity title with a 7-3 smashing of the UCL Yetis in a feisty contest that saw the Devils live up to their name, racking up more than a period’s worth of penalty minutes. After a rousing rendition of the national anthem by our …

item.title: Devils sharpen tridents for UCL
item.author: Timothy Runcorn,
item.description: Forget the Medics, everybody knows Imperial’s true rivals are UCL. They may have a more girls, reading weeks and the arguably the biggest Harlem Shake in Europe but they certainly don’t have the best university ice hockey team in London. A point that will be emphatically proven on Friday 1st March …
